normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Give Homeowners a Sunny Deal!

unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Give Homeowners a Sunny Deal!**
normalised: Guess what, folks? Getting solar panels on your roof in Chennai just got a whole lot cheaper! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is still offering some sweet subsidies, making it easier than ever to ditch those pesky electricity bills.

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? Getting solar panels on your roof in Chennai just got a whole lot cheaper! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still offering some sweet subsidies, making it easier than ever to ditch those pesky electricity bills.
normalised: Word on the street is that you can snag up to forty percent subsidy on systems up to three kilowatt. That's a lot of savings, especially with summer just around the corner! For larger systems, between three kilowatt and ten kilowatt, it drops a bit, but hey, every little bit helps, right? Doctor Sharma from I I T Madras says this is a great initiative to promote green energy among middle-class families like the Sharmas in our society.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that you can snag up to 40% subsidy on systems up to 3kW. That's a lot of savings, especially with summer just around the corner! For larger systems, between 3kW and 10kW, it drops a bit, but hey, every little bit helps, right? Dr. Sharma from IIT Madras says this is a great initiative to promote green energy among middle-class families like the Sharmas in our society.
normalised: Think about it: reduced reliance on Tamil Nadu Electricity Board (T N E B), a smaller carbon footprint, and bragging rights at your next kitty party. Plus, you can use that extra cash to finally buy that new saree from Nalli's you've been eyeing!

unnormalised: Think about it: reduced reliance on Tamil Nadu Electricity Board (TNEB), a smaller carbon footprint, and bragging rights at your next kitty party. Plus, you can use that extra cash to finally buy that new saree from Nalli's you've been eyeing!
normalised: Applications are online, just search M N R E rooftop solar subsidy. Don't delay, before the subsidy pot runs dry! Imagine powering your whole house, including that energy-guzzling A C, using the sun. Consider a two thousand square feet area with five kilowatt solar panels. It's an investment that pays off in the long run, folks. You could save up to rupees fifty thousand annually!. So, ditch the load-shedding worries this Diwali and embrace the sun!

unnormalised: Applications are online, just search MNRE rooftop solar subsidy. Don't delay, before the subsidy pot runs dry! Imagine powering your whole house, including that energy-guzzling AC, using the sun. Consider a 2000 sq ft area with 5kW solar panels. It's an investment that pays off in the long run, folks. You could save upto Rs. 50,000 annually!. So, ditch the load-shedding worries this Diwali and embrace the sun!
